msbt.message: Darling, I'm simply dying to have a pet . Alas, I can't seem to catch one
Want me to catch one?
I'm cheering for you!
What a terrible disappointment. I've missed yet another chance to catch
Want me to help?
You'll get it next time!
I can't tell you how much I want my own . Sadly, I can't seem to catch one
Want some help?
Keep at it!
Mother of pearl! I had in my sights, but it slipped away yet again!
Should I give it a try?
You'll get it next time!
Oh, that's wonderful! You are a true gem!
Oh my, thank you! I simply can't wait!
Oh my, that would be wonderful! I'll be waiting with bated breath!
Really?! You'd do that for me? Yes, that would be wonderful!
Ah well, hunting on my own can feel a bit discouraging at times, but I don't intend to give up yet!
I see. Well, every night I dream that I finally get my hands on one. Surely that means it's bound to happen!
I appreciate your support, darling. I'll keep at it!
Why, thank you. Honestly, I'd nearly given up, but I'll keep at it a bit longer.

Say, , are you good at catching bugs?And while we're on the subject, don't you think rhinoceros beetles have the most magnificent horns? I hear that the size varies from beetle to beetleâ€”a fact I'd very much like to study for myself. Surely you see where I'm going with this. Would you be a dear and catch one for me? Any kind of rhinoceros beetle will do!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I hope you don't mind my asking, , but are you good at catching bugs?You see, when I was a child, a stag beetle pinched my finger. Even now, the memory makes me shudder But it's time to move on and put my fears behind me. I will not be defeated by a mere stag beetle! That being said, I wonder if you would catch a stag beetle for me? Any stag beetle would do.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

, I must ask, just how good are you at catching bugs?You see, I've always thought cicadas used their wings to make their song. It seems I was mistaken.I'd love to observe a singing cicada for myself, and I wonder if you might catch one for me? I'm not picky, darling. Any sort of cicada will do.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Do you happen to be any good at catching bugs, ?I ask because butterflies have a mouth shaped like a straw, if you can believe it. And I'm simply dying to see how they drink nectar with it!Would you be a dear and catch one for me? I'm not picky. I'd be thrilled to receive any butterfly at all!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Tell me, , do you happen to have a talent for bug catching? I ask because, well I think dragonfly wings are simply gorgeous. The colors, the patterns they've inspired me to knit a shawl! But I need a dragonfly for reference. Would you catch one for me? I'm not picky, so any dragonfly will do.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

, do you happen to have a talent for catching bugs?You know how some bugs like to stay put on their flowers? Well, I'm studying which flowers they prefer. One problem, though I haven't caught any! Can you help? Any bug you find on a flower would be lovely!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Oh, , I need to ask you something.I've been trying to catch a bug that lives on stumpsThey're quite fascinating, you know. I even found the perfect specimen! Alas, it skittered away. As an act of charity, my dear, would you catch one for me? Any bug from a tree stump would be appreciated!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Tell me, , are you any good at fishing, by chance?You see, I don't seem to be very popular with river fish. They swim away as soon as I get close! Please! Could you catch a fish from a river for me? Really, any freshwater fish will do. Even one from a pond!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

, how are your fishing skills, darling?You see, I've found there are NOT plenty of fish in the sea for me. Ocean fish won't even sniff my line! Please, my dearcould you catch me an ocean fish? Any kind would be greatly appreciated!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

! You're someone who can handle this sort of thing that is, I have a little favor to ask. You see, I've been searching for for so longbut without any luck. You're good at bug catching, right? Would you mind going out and catching one for me?
Sure thing!
I'm a little busy...
Oh, ! No matter how hard I try, I can't seem to catch . All that searching and not a single one! Do they hate my perfume? Is it that repulsive?
I'll catch one for you.
No, that's not it.
Really?! Thank you, darling, for so graciously accepting!Your willingness to help is a great relief.
Oh dear, I see I apologize for being unreasonable.I suppose I'll just have to keep trying a bit longer.
What?! Really?! Well, aren't you my hero? Thank you so very much!

Oh dear, you're right, of course. And complaining won't help me catch the bug of my dreams, that's for sure. These are trying times. That just means it's time to focus on the positive and try even harder.
The thing is, I don't know what to do. You see, I haven't been able to catch a single . You're good at fishing, right? I wonder Would you be so kind as to catch one for me?
I'd be happy to!
I'm kinda busy here...
I tell you, I've tried everything! But the has evaded my grasp entirely! It's terribly frustrating. I'm starting to think I'm just no good at fishing
I'll catch one for you.
I believe in you!
That's wonderful news. Thank you! Best of luck, my dear.
Oh, I see. I apologize for being so forward. Perhaps another time.
What?! You'd do that for me? , you really are the best! Well then, I'll wait for your return. Thank you, my dear!
Thank you for trying to cheer me up, darling. I can't let this get me down. I will NOT give up!
